backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, fields, and tasks with access control, auto-assigning user roles and exposing CRUD methods for profiles and fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing the purpose and behavior of each frontend source file.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide describing steps to reproduce and verify fixes for field creation failures in different authentication states.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Documentation of the root cause, fixes, and validation steps for profile save failures after login.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style definitions including OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app entry scripts into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component orchestrating authentication, actor readiness, profile fetching, boot error handling, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Registers global error handlers and renders a fallback HTML UI when the app fails before React loads.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes global shims like process/env and imports boot fallback handlers before React mounts.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Displays all tasks with search, sorting, and field name resolution, showing loading skeletons or task cards.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with authentication checks and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a task with scale inputs, duration settings, and dependency selection, submitting via mutation.
Dialog for renaming a field, syncing initial state on open and submitting updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s attributes, duration, dependencies, and field assignment, with unit conversion and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a clickable card for a field showing its name, task count, and key attribute metrics with icons.
Provides a detailed field view with task list filtering, sorting, CRUD actions, and field-level attribute summaries.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top navigation bar with theme toggle, user avatar menu, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a welcome card listing app features and provides an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that prompts authenticated users to set their profile name and handles backend save state.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Shows a recoverable error message with retry support and optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button with tooltip to toggle ascending/descending sort order.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders an individual task with attributes, completion/undo flow, edit and delete options, and dependency display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and an authentication context for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines profile‑ and field‑related queries and mutations using a resilient actor with custom retry and error handling logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a persistent backend actor with safer initialization, limited retries, and automatic cache invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and design tokens for light and dark themes using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with field and task views, filtering, sorting, authentication checks, and field selection UI.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to extract, normalize, and format error messages, including detecting missing-profile cases and IC trap messages.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Contains helpers for converting between duration units and formatting minutes into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors into user-friendly messages with categorized error types.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Maps profile-save errors to clear categories and readable messages, handling nested IC error structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project schema, version info, and a detailed list of implemented features for a task‑and‑field management system. Captures CRUD operations, scoring attributes, dependencies, computed Field stats, hidden-completed behavior, and backend APIs.
